Feats-Skill-Intimidation -- Female Half-Orc Barbarian: 2
Strength: 16 (+3) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 10 (+0) Wisdom: 10 (+0) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 0; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Barbarian (Instinct); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Battle Cry; Group Coercion; Intimidating Glare; Intimidating Prowess; Lasting Coercion; Natural Skill; Quick Coercion; Scare To Death; Second Wind; Shake It Off; Terrified Retreat Barbarian Features: Ability Boost (Strength); Ability Boosts; Animal Instinct (Ape); Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Barbarian Feats; Barbarian Skills; Bestial Rage (Ape); Class Trained (Barbarian); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Instinct; Perception Expert; Rage; Save Expert (Fortitude; Will); Save Trained (Reflex); Skill Feats Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Orc; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Barbarian Feats: 2 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Instinct: 1 selection/Has the Anathema feature
Skill Feats: 1 selections
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by barbarian instinct
Half-Orc: Has the orc trait and may take orc and half-orc feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +6 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +0 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +10 (charisma; master) Society: +0 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +7 (strength; trained) Medicine: +0 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +0 (intelligence; untrained) Nature: +0 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +0 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +0 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Demon Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained)
Desert Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Common
Skill Notes:
Barbarian Skills: Skill Trained (Athletics; Choose 3 from any)
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Group Coercion: Can use Intimidation to Coerce 10 targets
Lasting Coercion: Successful Coerce lasts up to a week
Quick Coercion: Can Coerce with 1 rd of conversation
Scare To Death: (1) R30' Successful Intimidation vs. foe Will DC inflicts frightened 2; critical success inflicts frightened 2 and fleeing for 1 rd (save Fortitude critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death); failure inflicts frightened 1
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 36 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Barbarian: 17 (strength; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Battle Cry: Can use Demoralize as a free action on a foe during initiative
Bestial Rage (Ape): Can use fists to inflict 1d10+2 HP bludgeoning during rage
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Intimidating Prowess: +1 to Coerce or Demoralize when physically menacing the target
Rage: (1) Gains 4 temporary Hit Points and +2 HP melee damage, or +1 HP with an agile weapon, and suffers -1 Armor Class and loss of concentration actions for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Second Wind: Can rage again immediately after ending rage, suffering fatigue afterwards until after a 10 min rest
Terrified Retreat: Critical success on Demoralize causes a lower-level target to flee for 1 rd
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; trained); Will: +6 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Shake It Off: (1) Reduces a frightened condition by 1 and a sickened condition by 1, 2, or 3 with a fail, success, or critical success on a Fortitude save during rage
Notes
Validation Errors:
Battle Cry Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and intimidation rank (currently 3) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 8 allocated
Scare To Death Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and intimidation rank (currently 3) >= 4
Terrified Retreat Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and intimidation rank (currently 3) >= 3
